Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted Pakistan as the favorites given their home advantage.
Captain Babar Azam emphasized Pakistan’s focus on improving their powerplay performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai is a balanced pitch.
The team batting first at this venue has won 50% of its matches, so the toss does not make much of a difference here.
The temperature will hover around 30°C with 63% humidity. Winds at a speed of 4.76 m/s are expected.
Others: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side.
